Title: json_extract_path
Feature: json_extract_path ( from_json json, VARIADIC path_elems text[] ) → json
jsonb_extract_path ( from_json jsonb, VARIADIC path_elems text[] ) → jsonb
Description: Extracts JSON sub-object at the specified path. (This is functionally equivalent to the #> operator, but writing the path out as a variadic list can be more convenient in some cases.)
